content: MQM-R Wing nut Stainless steel wing nut for connecting modular support system components ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick connection of modular support system components to the open side of MQ strut channel Flexible wings – for quicker installation and positioning within MQ strut channel openings Serrated surfaces – for quicker, more accurate adjustment Compact dimensions Applications Fastening pipes and air ducts Fastening cable trays and cable baskets ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Nut: 1.4581 (A4) - DIN EN 10283, Wings: Plastic PA Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Environmental conditions: Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) Technical Data | Material composition | Nut: 1.4581 (A4) - DIN EN 10283, Wings: Plastic PA | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) ### ITEMS- 304020 - Wing nut MQM-F1/2-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc - 304018 - Wing nut MQM-F1/4-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc - 304019 - Wing nut MQM-F3/8-R SS316 - Package Size 25 pc
